message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. That's the most I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $9,500 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,000. Let's see if we can make a deal.
